Main.Title: Citation Checker
Main.Description: This app communicates with the CrossRef API. It is highly recommended that you set the contact details as required by CrossRef to ensure a good searching experience.

Configuration.Title: Configuration
Configuration.Description: These details will be sent to CrossRef with each API call. This allows you to use the more reliable servers reserved for "polite users". CrossRef will only contact you if there is an issue with your API use. Note that the CrossRef service is only called on demand.

Errors.NoAccess: You do not have access to this page.
Errors.InvalidInstitutionURL: Institution URL must begin with http:// or https://.
